page.title: 15BELLSQUARRY VILLAGE
page.content: {Bellsquarry}is situated in the south- west corner of{Livingston New Town, retaining a rural character,though the green fields of Brucefield Farm are now an Industrial Estate,and Crofthead Farm, in the north,a Community Centre. Long ago, stage coaches stopped at the Elm Tree but the{A71}now by-passes the village. The quiet attracts new residents. Mrs. Elaine Forrest,a hairdresser, resident here for 3 years thinks Bellsquarry an ideal place to live. It is in the country and yet she can reach her place of work in 15 minutes by car. We greatly enjoyed our talks with Miss Nellie Denison, who has lived here all her life. She lives at {Yellowstruther}mentioned in history books as far back as the 11th century. She was a kennel-maid, when young,at Alderstone House, now a Garden Centre.
